text: She recently made a return to music following her husband Nicolas Sarkozy's retirement from politics. And former First Lady of France Carla Bruni cemented her revived singing career with a sensational performance in New York City's Town Hall on Friday. The 50 - year - old Italian beauty looked far younger than her years in tight leather leggings as she took to the stage following the release of her first album in four years French Touch.
